project_chronos_short: Neuroevolutionary trading system combining deep reinforcement learning with evolutionary optimization
project_chronos_desc: AI-powered trading system using LSTM + Attention architecture with NEAT-like speciation. Combines PPO reinforcement learning with gradient-free neuroevolution for forex market strategy discovery.

project_ares_desc: Next-gen Solana trading platform with paper trading, anti-rug protection, copy trading, and AI-powered analysis. Built with SvelteKit, Bun, and Elysia.

veille_description: As part of my BTS SIO, I conduct a technology watch on post-quantum cryptography and its impact on current security systems.
veille_intro_p1: With the emergence of quantum computers capable of breaking traditional encryption algorithms (RSA, ECC), the industry is migrating to new quantum-resistant cryptographic standards.
veille_intro_p2: I analyze the algorithms standardized by NIST in 2024 (CRYSTALS-Kyber, CRYSTALS-Dilithium) and their concrete implications for blockchain infrastructures and financial systems.
veille_why_content: As a backend developer specialized in crypto trading systems, understanding the evolution of cryptography is essential to anticipate security migrations and ensure the longevity of applications.
veille_algo_kyber_desc: Key encapsulation mechanism (KEM) for secure key exchange. Replaces RSA/ECDH for establishing encrypted communications.
veille_algo_dilithium_desc: Digital signature scheme. Replaces RSA/ECDSA for authenticating data and transactions.
veille_algo_sphincs_desc: Hash-based signature alternative. Provides a backup option with different mathematical foundations.
veille_timeline_2016: NIST launches post-quantum cryptography standardization process
veille_timeline_2024: Official publication of FIPS 203, 204, and 205 standards
veille_timeline_2030: Recommended deadline for migration to post-quantum systems
veille_impact_blockchain_desc: Cryptocurrencies must migrate their signature schemes to protect wallets against future quantum attacks.
veille_impact_finance_desc: Banking systems and payment infrastructures need to update their encryption protocols.
veille_impact_web_desc: TLS/SSL certificates will need to adopt post-quantum algorithms to secure communications.
veille_sources_intro: To maintain an effective technology watch on post-quantum cryptography, I use several information sources:
veille_source_nist_desc: Direct monitoring of FIPS standards and official announcements from the standardization authority.
veille_source_research_desc: Reading academic papers on arXiv and publications from cryptography conferences (CRYPTO, EUROCRYPT).
veille_source_news_desc: Following security blogs (Schneier on Security, The Hacker News) and newsletters on cryptography.
veille_source_community_desc: Discussions on Reddit (r/crypto), Hacker News, and expert exchanges on LinkedIn.
banner_export_instructions: To export: Right-click on the banner, "Inspect", then right-click on the .banner element and "Capture node screenshot"
